<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  // Find the blog card by its title link (built file name)
  const link = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing a[href*="about_blog.html"]');
  if (!link) return;

  // Quarto's listing rows are usually a .row containing left date + right card
  const row = link.closest('.row, .listing-item, li, article, section, div');
  if (!row) return;

  // Hide any date UI within that row (covers multiple themes/layouts)
  row.querySelectorAll('.date, .listing-date, .quarto-title-meta, .quarto-title-meta-contents, .quarto-title-meta-heading').forEach(el => {
    el.style.display = 'none';
  });

  // In some themes the left date column is a narrow col; hide it too if present
  const leftCol = row.querySelector('.col-auto, .col-2, .g-col-2');
  if (leftCol) leftCol.style.display = 'none';
});
</script>
